name: Alice The Giver
description:
- A recommendation for everyone who's playing it -  make sure to turn your volume down, as it might get a bit too loud :P
- Also, anyone who has a 1920x1080 screen can play the game with full resolution and the looks would be as intended.

Alice The Giver - a game made under 48 hours for the Yogscast Game Jam.

In a world full of monsters. It is scary enough as it sounds, especially for Alice, a poor and weak young female monster, which can't fight and defend herself from all of the dangerous creatures around. The only thing Alice has is a big heart, which she holds to herself, hoping to find and give the heart to the husband that will protect her with all costs from all the enemies.

Gameplay:

You play as Alice who has a caring heart.
She can’t fight, but she can run faster than most of the enemies, and also carries a heart, which she can give to an enemy to become her protector.

Control: Use arrow Keys to move and Space to collect and throw the Heart.
